answers.answer: I was not familiar with "Perianal Abscesses" so I checked out a couple of sights.  On one sight it did say that some people are more susceptible to perianal abscesses such as those that have:  Diabetes, Aids or HIV, Crohn's or persons on medications that suppress the body's immune system, such as steroids (prednisone, methylprednisolone), or those undergoing chemotherapy for cancer ..........so I do not think that it is indictive of having Crohn's.
